extracted.name: Construction
extracted.description:
### Overview
The Construction practice area focuses on legal issues related to the construction industry, including subcontractor rights, lien waivers, and contracts. Attorneys specialize in navigating the complexities of construction law to support clients in minimizing risks and ensuring compliance with state regulations.

extracted.name: Corporate Law
extracted.description:
## Overview of Corporate Law
Corporate Law encompasses all the laws and regulations pertaining to the creation, operation, and dissolution of corporations. This field of law is essential for businesses to navigate legal obligations and protect their interests.

### Key Areas Include:
- Formation of Corporations
- Corporate Governance
- Compliance with Securities Laws
- Mergers and Acquisitions
- Corporate Litigation

extracted.name: Employment Law
extracted.description:
## Overview of Employment Law
Employment Law encompasses a wide range of legal practices aimed at protecting workers, enabling employers to comply with regulations, and fostering fair and just workplaces. This area of law includes statutory and contractual obligations related to employment relationships, workplace safety, anti-discrimination, and employee rights.

Significant topics include wage and hour laws, workplace discrimination, employee benefits, and non-compete agreements.

extracted.description:
**Health Care**

The Health Care practice area focuses on legal issues surrounding the healthcare industry, including malpractice, licensing, and regulatory compliance. With the recent advancements and challenges facing the healthcare sector, our attorneys are committed to navigating complex legal landscapes for health care providers.

## Intellectual Property Law

Intellectual Property Law involves the laws that protect creations of the mind, including inventions, literary and artistic works, and symbols, names, and images used in commerce.
